rows.label: qev060604_MSG0001
rows.name:
Oh, it's you! *fsssh* Does this mean you have found a
gorkwa for me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0002
rows.name:
Yes, this is without question the legacy of Golbogga!
Now I can dedicate my life to my sacred duty. *fsssh*
I do not know how to properly express my thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0003
rows.name: ...Is something amiss? *fsssh* You look confused.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_JNK0010
rows.name: Point Out

rows.label: qev060604_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that Orleron's manner of speaking seems different.

rows.label: qev060604_JNK0020
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev060604_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask about Vera.

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0004
rows.name:
Ah, yes. While you were retrieving this gorkwa,
I matured to adulthood. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0005
rows.name:
...You still seem perplexed. *fsssh* Let me help.
Zaruboggan childhood is extremely brief in duration.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0006
rows.name:
*fsssh* And thanks to your advice, I spent that time
studying with other Zaruboggan in order to become
an upstanding member of my people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0007
rows.name:
Heh. The woman you saw a moment ago, Vera,
is someone I met on this ship as well. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0008
rows.name:
She...intrigues me. *fsssh* But the closer I try to get,
the more it seems to invite her ire.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0009
rows.name:
She is a human woman who recently started paying
this place visits. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0010
rows.name:
I found myself intrigued by her, and desired to grow as
close to her as I am members of my own race. *fsssh*
I tried to approach her on several occasions, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0011
rows.name:
Well, it seems everything I try only drives her further
away. *fsssh* Truly, you humans are a complex and
opaque people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_JNK0030
rows.name: Probe Methods

rows.label: qev060604_SEL0031
rows.name:
Ask Orleron what exactly he's
"tried" when it comes to Vera.

rows.label: qev060604_JNK0040
rows.name: Inquire about Vera

rows.label: qev060604_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask to know more about what Vera is like.

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0012
rows.name:
First, I tried to make a gift of some excellent voltant.
*fsssh* She seemed quite shocked.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0013
rows.name:
*fsssh* Every day since then, I have traveled down to
New LA to profess my affections for her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0014
rows.name:
All for naught, I'm afraid. *fsssh* She is passionately
in love with something that she calls "freedom."
I fear this is a trait I lack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0015
rows.name:
Still, how is it that I can feel so much for her,
yet fail to communicate it properly? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0016
rows.name:
*fsssh* She... Hmm. She possesses a wealth of things
which my kind lacks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0017
rows.name:
Her joy, sorrows, and anger are so pronounced.
So vibrant. *fsssh* At times, her actions are utterly
unpredictable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0018
rows.name:
Is that all tied to this "freedom" she so often mentions?
I find it bewildering in the best possible sense. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0019
rows.name:
As I think on it now, my feelings for her seem slightly
different from the connection I feel to others of my kind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0020
rows.name:
If only she were as simple as voltant! *fsssh*
Then I would know precisely how to treat her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0021
rows.name:
Apologies. I do not mean to complain. *fsssh*
But might I be able to hear your advice,
as a fellow human?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0022
rows.name:
*fsssh* I do not intend to change the way I live as a
Zaruboggan, but nor do I wish to give up on her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_JNK0050
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev060604_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask about Vera's interests.

rows.label: qev060604_JNK0060
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev060604_SEL0061
rows.name: Tell Orleron to give her a nice present.

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0023
rows.name:
She seems quite interested in Miran ecology. *fsssh*
Apparently she came to this ship in search of a vigent
blood sample.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0024
rows.name:
She mentioned wanting to gather something she called
"DNA" from it. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0025
rows.name:
Now that you mention it, she came to the ship in
search of a vigent blood sample. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0026
rows.name:
Apparently she is a student of Miran ecology. *fsssh*
She plans to extract something called "DNA" from it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0027
rows.name:
Do you think if I gave her the sample she desired,
she might see that my affections are sincere? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0028
rows.name:
...Though I fear that brings me to yet another favor.
*fsssh* Could I possibly convince you to collect some
vigent blood for me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0029
rows.name:
I will pay you as much as I am able, both for this
and the gorkwa. *fsssh* I know it is an imposition,
but I would be most grateful for the help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0030
rows.name:
Vera mentioned that vigents can be found in Cauldros.
*fsssh* Good luck, and thank you again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0031
rows.name:
Oh, Vera... *fsssh* I never imagined that simply being
unable to speak with someone could cause such pain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0032
rows.name:
This is different from the hunger to devoltanize. *fsssh*
It is more urgent. Keener.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0033
rows.name:
My chest feels hot—almost burning—and my breath
comes shallow. *fsssh* What is this state I am in?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_JNK0070
rows.name: Suggest Love

rows.label: qev060604_SEL0071
rows.name: Explain the mysteries of love to Orleron.

rows.label: qev060604_JNK0080
rows.name: Suggest Heartburn

rows.label: qev060604_SEL0081
rows.name: Tell Orleron that he may want to see a doctor.

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0034
rows.name:
Love? What is that? *fsssh* At times, the words from
your lips are utterly foreign to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0035
rows.name:
...A special emotional bond two people share? *fsssh*
...Racing heartbeats? *fsssh* SURGING LOINS?!
*fsssh* *fsssh* *fsssh* *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0036
rows.name:
Ah. I should mention that Zaruboggan do not share
your humans' division into male and female sexes.
*fsssh* Do you suppose "love" is still possible?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0037
rows.name:
Though I will admit that my symptoms align closely with
those you described. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0038
rows.name:
I am ill then? *fsssh* Thank you for your insight.
I admire your wisdom.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0039
rows.name:
Though I am afraid human medical facilities would not
be able to treat this affliction. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0040
rows.name:
The cause clearly lies with Vera. *fsssh* I would like to
begin by repairing my relationship with her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0041
rows.name:
So then? How did your search go? *fsssh*
Did you acquire the vigent blood?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0042
rows.name: Ah, this is precisely what she wanted![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0043
rows.name: Thank you. *fsssh* I will take this straight to her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0044
rows.name:
But before I go, could I pester you for one last bit of
advice? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0045
rows.name: How should I approach her with this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_JNK0090
rows.name: Encourage Boldness

rows.label: qev060604_SEL0091
rows.name: Tell Orleron to be aggressive and not back down.

rows.label: qev060604_JNK0100
rows.name: Encourage Respect

rows.label: qev060604_SEL0101
rows.name: Tell Orleron to be considerate and gentlemanly.

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0046
rows.name:
Understood! *fsssh* I will chase her down with the feral
intensity of a wild beast![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0047
rows.name:
Understood. *fsssh* I will be as soft as a downy feather
blown on a light breeze.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060604_MSG0048
rows.name:
*fsssh* Now if you'll excuse me?
And once again, thank you for all the help.[ST:wait ]
